title: Washington, D.C. Crime Prediction
summary: Developed ML models (Decision Tree, Logistic Regression, SVM) to classify crime types using D.C. datasets with spatial and temporal features; evaluated with precision, recall, F1, and accuracy.

title: Stock Market Trends & Volatility Analysis
summary: Analyzed five years of U.S. stock data (~8K tickers) using Apache Spark and PySpark. Engineered time-series features, identified volatility spikes, and built a logistic regression model using Spark MLlib.

title: SMS Spam Detection System
summary: Built models using Naive Bayes, SVM, and Decision Tree algorithms to identify spam SMS messages.

title: Pizza Delivery Analytics Website
summary: Developed a web platform for pizza ordering and customer preference analysis using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
